languages.text: "{name}, твои цвета! Что... что ты с ним сделал, ксенос?" {n}Кассия вскидывает подбородок, и третье око на ее лбу угрожающе вздрагивает за прикрытыми веками.{/n}
"{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, твои цвета! Что... что ты с ним сделал, ксенос?" {n}Кассия вскидывает подбородок, и третье око на ее лбу угрожающе вздрагивает за прикрытыми веками.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}様、そのお姿は！いったい…異種族よ、貴様陛下に何をしたの？」{n}カシアが顎を上げると、額の第三の目がまぶたの奥で威嚇するように蠢く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様、そのお姿は！いったい…異種族よ、貴様陛下に何をしたの？」{n}カシアが顎を上げると、額の第三の目がまぶたの奥で威嚇するように蠢く。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，你的颜色！你……你对{mf|他|她}做了什么，异形？”{n}卡西娅扬起头，额头上的第三只眼微微颤动着，充满了威胁的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你的颜色！你……你对{mf|他|她}做了什么，异形？”{n}卡西娅扬起头，额头上的第三只眼微微颤动着，充满了威胁的意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡{name}, tus colores! ¿Qué...? ¿Qué le has hecho, xenos?». {n}Cassia levanta la barbilla y el tercer ojo de su frente se agita amenazadoramente tras el párpado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}, tus colores! ¿Qué...? ¿Qué le has hecho, xenos?». {n}Cassia levanta la barbilla y el tercer ojo de su frente se agita amenazadoramente tras el párpado.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, Eure Farben! Was ... was habt Ihr {mf|ihm|ihr} angetan, Xenos?" {n}Cassia hebt das Kinn und das dritte Auge auf ihrer Stirn flattert bedrohlich hinter dem Augenlid.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{name}, Eure Farben! Was ... was habt Ihr {mf|ihm|ihr} angetan, Xenos?" {n}Cassia hebt das Kinn und das dritte Auge auf ihrer Stirn flattert bedrohlich hinter dem Augenlid.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, vos couleurs ! Que... que lui avez-vous fait, xénos ? »{n}Cassia relève le menton et son troisième œil se met à papilloter dangereusement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {name}, vos couleurs ! Que... que lui avez-vous fait, xénos ? »{n}Cassia relève le menton et son troisième œil se met à papilloter dangereusement.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, renklerin!.. Sen... Ona ne yaptın zeno?" {n}Cassia çenesini kaldırıyor. Alnındaki üçüncü gözü, göz kapağının ardında tehditkâr bir şekilde titreşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{name}, your colours! What... what have you done to {mf|him|her}, xenos?" {n}Cassia lifts her chin and the third eye on her forehead flutters threateningly behind the eyelid.{/n}
